original_title: Troll Bridge: An Unexpectedly Lengthy Journey
overview: Behind the scenes for the Terry Pratchett TROLL BRIDGE short film production. TROLL BRIDGE is an epic of momentous proportions, and so too is the story behind it. Painstakingly recorded and catalogued over 17 years, AN UNEXPECTEDLY LENGTHY JOURNEY is the ultimate presentation of the TROLL BRIDGE making.
title: Troll Bridge: An Unexpectedly Lengthy Journey
